Question: The original music score was composed by this person and Lennie Niehaus.
Hints: French President Jacques Chirac told this person that he embodied "the best of Hollywood".
In 1980, this person directed and played the lead role in Bronco Billy alongside Locke, Scatman Crothers, and Sam Bottoms.
Later that year, this person starred in Any Which Way You Can, the sequel to Every Which Way but Loose.
